testcase.classname: To Validate the login functionality of fb application
testcase.name: To Validate the login with create new account button with respective fields
testcase.system-out: When user click the create new account button...............................passed And user navigate into new window and fill the firstname and surname........passed And user select the date of birth...........................................passed And user select any one gender option.......................................passed And user enter the mobile number............................................passed And user set the password of the account....................................passed Then user account was created...............................................passed

testcase.classname: To Validate the login functionality of facebook application
testcase.name: To Validate the login with valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: When user want to enter the values in username and password field...........passed And user click the login button.............................................passed Then user navigate into home page...........................................passed

testcase.classname: To Validate the login functionality of facebook application
testcase.name: To Validate the login with invalid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: When user enter the values in username and password field and click the login button.passed Then user navigate into Error page..........................................passed
